frontMatter.title: 用Markdown可以做什么
frontMatter.summary: 本文介绍了零成本用Markdown搞定博客网站、笔记文档、演讲胶片与年终总结报告，彻底抛弃Word与PPT

prev.title: Vue.js: The Documentary
prev.summary: by honeypot.io | What began as a side project of a Google developer now shares the JS leaderboard with #Reactjs and #Angularjs... Evan You tells the story of how he fought against the odds to bring #Vuejs to life.  Coming to a screen near you on Feb 24th!

next.title: 给大家介绍一下我的最新发明：Emoji Mask
next.summary: 戴着口罩与人交谈时，你是否感觉表达受到了限制、沟通产生了隔阂… 哎，都怪口罩遮住了你的表情！该怎么办呢？ 向大家隆重介绍我的新发明：Emoji Mask，可以显示表情的口罩。
